name: 蔡銘修
objective:
認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
1. How to analyze a research paper.
2. How to construct a research paper.
3. How to write summaries and critiques.
schedule:
01 02/19 Intro(research topic)
02 02/26 Prospectus-1
03 03/05 Prospectus-2
04 03/12 Writing Summaries-1
05 03/19 Writing Summaries-2
06 03/26 Research Introduction-1(1 presenter)
07 04/02 Research Introduction-2(turn in Introduction)
08 04/09 Research Method-1(1 presenter)
09 04/16 Midterm Week
10 04/23 Research Method-2(turn in Method)
11 04/30 Research Literature Review(1 presenter)(turn in Literature Review)
12 05/07 Research Result and Discussion-1(1 presenter)
13 05/14 Research Result and Discussion-2(turn in Result)
14 05/21 Research Conclusion-1(1 presenter)
15 05/28 Holiday
16 06/04 Final Presentation-1
17 06/11 Final Presentation-2(turn final paper)
18 06/18 Final Exam Week
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 10%
2. Presentation 20%
3. Final Presentation 20%
4. Final Research Paper 40%
5. Submission Proof for a journal or conference. 10%
